title: 4 estrellas
overview: Clara, an old family friend, has returned with a secret... "I'm a Lasierra too." Rita, a mother very concerned with appearances, is going to go crazy with the news. Marta, capricious and superficial, will declare war from the first minute. And Silvia, blessed Silvia, will do everything possible to make sure the situation doesn't get out of hand. Now they will have to put their differences aside to move the hotel forward. Will they be able to do it?
